programme.title: Me and My Golf
programme.desc: Andy Proudman and Piers Ward explain how to dial in distances with short irons and how to hit them on line every time; they also explain the bounce angle and how to choose the right amount.

programme.title: Me and My Golf
programme.desc: Andy and Piers show how to play a variety of shots around the green, including the high spinning chip, low runner, and many more. They also explain the importance of focusing on a landing zone when hitting greenside shots.

programme.title: Me and My Golf
programme.desc: Andy and Piers explain the necessary fundamentals to hit effective greenside and fairway bunker shots. They also explain how to hit it close from one of the most feared shots in the game, the 30-40-yard bunker shot.

programme.title: Me and My Golf
programme.desc: Me and My Golf's Andy and Piers explain how to master judging speed and reads on the greens. They also demonstrate the proper mechanics for hitting it solid and making those clutch putts.

programme.title: Me and My Golf
programme.desc: Andy and Piers explain how to master different lies on the course, featuring the buried lie, sitting up lie, and flyer lie.

programme.title: Me and My Golf
programme.desc: Andy and Piers explain that the best play isn't always the hero shot. They demonstrate how save strokes by hitting over, under, and around trouble.

programme.title: Me and My Golf
programme.desc: Andy and Piers explain how to save strokes by thinking around the course; they'll demonstrate how to take advantage of both sides of the tee-box and the importance of a good pre-shot routine.

programme.title: My Roots: Ernie Els

programme.title: My Roots: Bernhard Langer
programme.desc: Bernhard Langer shares his own story in open and honest language, giving golf fans an unprecedented look at his life, losses, and love of the game.
